properties.Name: FinancialStatementColumn
properties.Description: A column of a financial statement. Each column will contain values that are representative of the attributes associated with the column.

Columns.Name: LegalEntityId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Legal Entity.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Financial Statement.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the financial statement is prepared.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the financial statement is prepared.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementColumnId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a financial statement column.

Columns.Name: ColumnPeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for the column of the financial statement.

Columns.Name: ColumnPeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for the column of the financial statement.

Columns.Name: ColumnHeading
Columns.Description: The heading that is to appear at the top of the column of the financial statement.

Columns.Name: LevelOfPrecisionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Level of Precision.
